00007 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>

00009 #include <WLineEdit>
00010 #include <WIntValidator>
00011 #include <WText>
00012 #include <WPushButton>
00013 #include <WApplication>
00014 #include <WBreak>
00015 
00016 #include "RoundedWidget.h"
00017 #include "StyleExample.h"

00019 wchar_t loremipsum[] = L"Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing "
00020    "elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et "
00021    "dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis "
00022    "nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip " 
00023    "ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in "
00024    "reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu "
00025    "fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat "
00026    "non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit "
00027    "anim id est laborum.";

00029 StyleExample::StyleExample(WContainerWidget *parent)
00030   : WContainerWidget(parent)
00031 {
00032   w_ = new RoundedWidget(RoundedWidget::All, this);
00033 
00034   new WText(loremipsum, w_->contents());
00035   new WBreak(this);
00036 
00037   new WText(L"Color (rgb): ", this);
00038   r_ = createColorLineEdit(w_->backgroundColor().red());
00039   g_ = createColorLineEdit(w_->backgroundColor().green());
00040   b_ = createColorLineEdit(w_->backgroundColor().blue());
00041 
00042   new WBreak(this);
00043 
00044   new WText(L"Radius (px): ", this);
00045   radius_ = createColorLineEdit(w_->cornerRadius());
00046 
00047   new WBreak(this);
00048 
00049   WPushButton *p = new WPushButton(L"Update!", this);
00050   p->clicked.connect(SLOT(this, StyleExample::updateStyle));
00051 
00052   new WBreak(this);
00053 
00054   error_ = new WText(L"", this);
00055 }
00056 
00057 WLineEdit *StyleExample::createColorLineEdit(int value)
00058 {
00059   WLineEdit *le = new WLineEdit(boost::lexical_cast<std::wstring>(value),
00060                                 this);
00061   le->setTextSize(3);
00062   le->setValidator(new WIntValidator(0, 255));
00063 
00064   return le;
00065 }
00066 
00067 void StyleExample::updateStyle()
00068 {
00069   if ((r_->validate() == WValidator::Valid)
00070       && (g_->validate() == WValidator::Valid)
00071       && (b_->validate() == WValidator::Valid)
00072       && (radius_->validate() == WValidator::Valid)) {
00073     w_->setBackgroundColor(WColor(boost::lexical_cast<int>(r_->text()),
00074                                   boost::lexical_cast<int>(g_->text()),
00075                                   boost::lexical_cast<int>(b_->text())));
00076     w_->setCornerRadius(boost::lexical_cast<int>(radius_->text()));
00077     error_->setText(L"");
00078   } else {
00079     error_->setText(L"All values must be numbers between 0 and 255...");
00080   }
00081 }
00082 
00083 WApplication *createApplication(const WEnvironment& env)
00084 {
00085   WApplication *app = new WApplication(env);
00086   app->setTitle(L"Style example");
00087 
00088   app->root()->addWidget(new StyleExample());
00089   return app;
00090 }
00091 
00092 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00093 {
00094    return WRun(argc, argv, &createApplication);
00095 }
